name: HSP_BKT_SPLIT_EOB_TX_IDS
description: This table contains the eligible payment IDs that can contribute to the EOB for a given claim on a hospital billing bucket.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EOB_PMT_TX_ID
columns.description: The eligible payment IDs that can contribute to the EOB for this claim.
